name: Break the surface (Dot Matrix Spook)
description:
Short and sweet puzzle platformer about a fox and his A.I. friend, created for OLC GameJam 2021.

All assets, music, code etc. made by me.

End credit song - "We'll meet again" by Vera Lynn, tracked to TIC-80 format by me.

Collisions can be a little wonky at times, but nothing game-breaking.

I am very tired.
